resources.string: An action game is a video game genre that emphasizes physical challenges, including handâ€“eye coordination and reaction-time. Enemy attacks and obstacles deplete the player character\'s health and lives, and the player receives a game over when they run out of lives.
A video game of the genre characterized by investigation, exploration, puzzle-solving, interaction with game characters, and a focus on narrative rather than reflex-based challenges.

A video game genre that focuses on skillful thinking and planning to achieve victory. It emphasizes strategic, tactical, and sometimes logistical challenges. Many games also offer economic challenges and exploration.
A video game genre that simulates the practice of sports. Most sports have been recreated with a game, including team sports, track and field, extreme sports and combat sports.
